name: Pokémon Stadium Battle Set
description:
This special edition contains the following:
  • Pokémon Stadium
  • Indigo and yellow Nintendo 64 and one controller; both feature the Pokémon logo, and the console is printed with images of Pokémon
  • Nintendo 64 Transfer Pak
Releases in some countries also came with a VHS containing episodes of the Pokémon anime, while other countries instead got a Pokémon travel journal.
